<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://www.cppblog.com/huaxiazhihuo/archive/2011/07/11/150631.html"><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E9CE9;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;text-decoration:none;text-underline:none">C++</span></b><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:#2E9CE9;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;text-decoration:none;text-underline:none">杂谈</span></b></a></span><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">      
C++</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">是我最喜欢的语言，</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:red;mso-font-kerning:0pt">它集自由、博大、复杂、简约、高效于一身</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">，又能很好地均衡这些特点，使它们和平共处，将</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">“</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">不为用到的任何特性付出一点点代价</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">”</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">的宗旨贯彻到底，其他的任何一种语言的都不具备像</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C++</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">这样的内涵，使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C++</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">之时，直有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C++</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">在手，江山我有的感觉。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">C</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">虽然能让你掌管一切，但用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">开发，有如戴着镣铐在跳舞，无时不刻要小心翼翼地人肉管理一切细节，实在太累了。而用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C#</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">JAVA</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">等其他语言时，虽然养尊处优，但想走不寻常路之时，又处处受限制，很有点寄人篱下的味道，未免不痛快。只有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C++</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">，既能下，又能上，进可攻，退可守，想怎么样就怎么样，尽情地飞翔。只要你愿意，你就可以在这一片世界里随心所欲地发挥你的一切聪明才智，创造出种种奇技淫巧，而不会受到一点点约束。问题来了，自由得过头了，就失去了控制，自由未必是好事。好多人，自由得甚至忘记了他要用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C++</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:
